ca.mcgill.hs.plugin
Class FileOutput

java.lang.Object
  ca.mcgill.hs.plugin.OutputPlugin
      ca.mcgill.hs.plugin.FileOutput
All Implemented Interfaces:
Plugin, java.lang.Runnable
public class FileOutput
extends OutputPlugin

An OutputPlugin which writes data to files.

Constructor Detail

FileOutput

public FileOutput(android.content.Context context)
This is the basic constructor for the FileOutput plugidatan. It has to be instantiated before it is started, and needs to be passed a reference to a Context.

Parameters:
context - - the context in which this plugin is created.

the String representing the extension to add to the filename.

onDataReceived

final void onDataReceived(DataPacket packet)
This method gets called whenever an InputPlugin registered to FileOutput has data available to output. This method creates a file handle (if it doesn't exist already) for the InputPlugin the received DataPacket comes from. This method calls the appropriate version of dataParse based on the DataPacket type.

Specified by:
onDataReceived in class OutputPlugin
Parameters:
packet - the DataPacket received.

onPluginStart

protected void onPluginStart()
Description copied from class: OutputPlugin
Called when this OutputPlugin is started. This method is meant to be overridden.

Specified by:
onPluginStart in class OutputPlugin

onPluginStop

protected void onPluginStop()
Closes all files currently open.

Specified by:
onPluginStop in class OutputPlugin
